attributes.action: Have all asthma suffers moved to priority group 6
attributes.additional_details: We strongly as the government to reconsider this and move us to priority group 6 and have this treated as an underlying health condition
attributes.background:
Asthma is a condition that affects the lungs and yet people with moderate or mild asthma are not considered a priority for the covid 19 vacine until the first nine groups have been injected
We ask the government to reconsider
